message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"to rest or take a break","sentence":"他们休息。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animated scene showing three people sitting together on a simple bench, looking tired but smiling, taking a break. The background is minimal with gentle faded colors, comforting light and a peaceful post-apocalyptic feel. Signs of gentle decay—like a cracked wall—suggest a changed world, but the focus is on the people relaxing together in a safe space.","sentence_translation":"They rest."}
